## Source: ossf-package-analysis (12204aa041b42e90b2749e8026e866fbe3d5ff07e79899073fbc585b9950b727)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'crypto-pygame' @ 10.14.7 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
